Name: Bugged Dungeon
About the game: Dodge obstacles and solve puzzles in this ZX homage ! Help Bumble undo the curse on his family, and re-gain your controls one by one in each of Bugged Dungeons’s 20 brain-bending rooms. Create your own levels and share for other players to play them. Regain Control Collect the buttons on each level to use those same buttons on your device. You’ll start each level with access to only a few directions, constantly re-unlocking abilities as simple as jumping to the right! Gameplay Galore Gain/Loose keys, jump from one teleportation pad to another, avoid spikes that rise from the ground, chase keys that don't want to be caught, race against the timer and open doors just to find yourself in the next sticky situation. Create and Share Use the highly customizable level editor to make your own levels and upload them online for anyone to play!
